price: 8. Markiise uu yimid, cod baa dhawaaqay leh: “Waa la barakeeyey waxa dabka agti ah iyo waxa hareera joogaba, xurmona waxaa leh oo ka hufan (ceeb iyo nuqsaan) Allaah, Rabbiga uumanka.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِيَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهَا وَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahā nūdiya an būrika man fī al-nāri waman ḥawlahā wasub'ḥāna al-lahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
